column4: Absolute pay to win trash game. They made dusk chateau the hardest level in the game by spamming too many high level enemies to the point where you need to buy powerups which you can buy with real money.The devs honestly need to get off their asses and tell everyone the truth that this game is pay to win trash. The devs never play tested all the levels to see if they can be beat without powerups because they know you can't. Ironhide studios is trash.
